AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gatherer assistant
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always afraid of wild animals, so {PAWN_gender ? he : she} became an assistant to the tribal gatherer. [PAWN_nameDef] learned a lot over the years in the forest.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young gatherer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: From early childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] loved to go to the forest and live close to nature. Perhaps this is what saved [PAWN_nameDef] from death when the tribe was destroyed by evil machines.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Weak child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood was not easy. The tribe abandoned [PAWN_nameDef] at the edge of the river because {PAWN_gender ? he : she} could not swim.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Rock climber
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the mountains, far from the settlements. [PAWN_nameDef] was usually assigned by the community to take care of the pets and prepare food.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Blacksmith's journeyman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the family of a tribal blacksmith who made spears and nets for fishing. Gradually [PAWN_nameDef] takes over father's skills and becomes his apprentice.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tribal messenger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always distinguished by endurance on long campaigns, so [PAWN_nameDef] usually carried out messages to distant tribal communities on behalf of the leader.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Witch's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] mother was declared a witch, which was the reason for her public execution. [PAWN_nameDef] was forced to flee the tribe that very night.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Potter's apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a poor potter's family. From early childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] mastered the art of craft, which allowed {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to gain prestige in the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Loner hermit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The tribe got rid of {PAWN_gender ? him : her} when [PAWN_nameDef] was very young. [PAWN_nameDef] survived despite everything and vowed revenge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cave keeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Every night [PAWN_nameDef] watches the endless darkness around his cave, guarding the peace of his relatives.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Captive
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s family was captured and driven into slavery to the mountain passes. [PAWN_nameDef] had no rights in the new tribe and was doing dirty work.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of slave
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family of hereditary slaves raised to serve the chief.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young archer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: From early childhood [PAWN_nameDef] fell in love with bow training and strove to go hunting with the tribe. One day [PAWN_nameDef] saves the tribe from an ambush with his well-aimed shot.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Superstitious child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always believed in the stories that his fellow tribesmen told around the fire. It seems that his faith is unshakable.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young squire
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed many of the military campaigns of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe and invariably acted as a squire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Eskimo's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the far north. From early childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] knows how to handle deer and live in low temperatures.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young explorer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] often left {PAWN_gender ? his : her} native tribe in search of adventure. One day [PAWN_nameDef] returns, seeing only ruins in front of him.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Desert child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a distant and hot desert, which tested {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe for strength every day.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Wasteland child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the war-polluted wastelands, through which for many years {PAWN_gender ? his : her} ruined tribe walked.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Flood child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: At a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] learned what a flood is. [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe was at the center of the disaster, and the tribal shaman's rituals failed to stop the storm surge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Traveler's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a nomadic tribal family. From early childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] is on long exhausting hikes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chief's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the family of a tribal leader. {PAWN_gender ? He : She} was free from many jobs and lived for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} own pleasure.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Warrior's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: From early childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] studied the art of war with {PAWN_gender ? his : her} father, the leader of a tribal village. One day {PAWN_gender ? his : her} father dies and bequeathed to {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to rule the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Caravan's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Almost all of [PAWN_nameDef]'s childhood was spent traveling. [PAWN_nameDef] lived in a merchant caravan belonging to a merchant tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Campfire keeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] guarded the fire from wind and rain, preventing it from going out.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Thrown child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: At an early age, [PAWN_nameDef] was abandoned by {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe. Weeks of wandering brought [PAWN_nameDef] to a new home.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Surviving child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] space station crashed. [PAWN_nameDef]'s body was discovered by local aborigines and raised as their child.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Lonely avenger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe was destroyed by evil machines. Only [PAWN_nameDef] was able to escape in time, making {PAWN_gender ? his : her} way through the wild jungle. Once, [PAWN_nameDef] vowed revenge and destroys dozens of mechanoids with one bow.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Insane child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up like an ordinary child until [PAWN_nameDef] fell ill with a strange disease. Alone, [PAWN_nameDef] killed a dozen people from {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe and fled into the forest.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young pathfinder
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] loved to go hunting and explore the surrounding forest. [PAWN_nameDef] took notes in the trees, taking note of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} observations.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Chief's lover
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The tribe bought [PAWN_nameDef] from a passing caravan. The leader of the tribe liked [PAWN_nameDef], predetermining fate.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tanner's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into the family of a tanner. From childhood, [PAWN_nameDef]'s father taught {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to decorate skins and passed on all {PAWN_gender ? his : her} skills.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Shipwreck child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] and {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe sailed across the ocean, fleeing the threat on makeshift boats. One day, a storm destroys their caravan, nailing [PAWN_nameDef] to a desert island.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fisherman's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a tribal family of hunters and fishermen. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father taught {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to skillfully catch and cook fish, as well as weave nets for fishing.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Priest's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a noble family of priests of the desert tribe. According to tradition, [PAWN_nameDef] was supposed to become a high priest, for which [PAWN_nameDef] had been preparing for many years.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Carefree child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef]'s tribe was at the peak of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} power at the time of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} birth, which allowed {PAWN_gender ? him : her} to devote himself to what [PAWN_nameDef] loved.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Diligent child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family of strict morals in a poor tribal community. From childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] showed great activity for the minimal praise of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} parents.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Sacrificed child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: According to legend, once a year, a sacrifice should be made to a volcano in order for the tribe to continue to live. This time, the victim was to be young [PAWN_nameDef]. At the time of the sacrifice, [PAWN_nameDef] managed to break the chains and escape.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mowgli
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The tribe got rid of [PAWN_nameDef] in infancy, but [PAWN_nameDef] was picked up and raised by a panther. [PAWN_nameDef]'s habits are much like animal habits.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hearth keeper
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a child, [PAWN_nameDef] loved to spend time by the fire, preparing food for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} fellow tribesmen.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Adventurer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] never sat still. Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] wanders through forests and mountains, often contrary to the prohibitions of the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Miner's child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a family of miners who built a network of underground temples for a tribal cult.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young farmer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] loves to tinker with plants. [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was a farmer in a sedentary tribe and taught {PAWN_gender ? him : her} a lot.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Muffalo shepherd
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] lived with a small mountain tribe who were involved in raising muffalo. Since childhood, [PAWN_nameDef] walked mountain passes.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Storyteller
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved to listen to the stories of {PAWN_gender ? his : her} father, but soon [PAWN_nameDef]'s father was gone. In memory of him, [PAWN_nameDef] tells stories around the campfire for {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Child of battles
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born during the religious wars in which {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe actively participated. [PAWN_nameDef] had a chance to witness many battles and take part in them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tribe symbol
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in turbulent times, and {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe was on the brink of destruction. At a young age, [PAWN_nameDef] led the battle and was able to save {PAWN_gender ? his : her} tribe from plunder. After that, [PAWN_nameDef] became a revered symbol of endurance and strength.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Protector of the weak
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] hates injustice and protects the weak from childhood. [PAWN_nameDef] made many enemies in the tribe, but also many admirers.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keeper of children
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] looks after the little children in the tribe.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Disobedient child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loves to get into trouble and does it regularly, despite punishment from the tribe.
